name: I Can't See (Kantros)
description:
Six Levels In Total.

Controls -

A/D - Left & Right

Left Arrow/Right Arrow - Left & Right

Space/Up Arrow - Jump

R - Restart ENTIRE run (for speed running)

Made for GMTK 2021!
Theme: Joined Together

The power is out and you must traverse the darkness. However! You are in luck. you have a battery pack and as long as you are Joined Together with the generator you can see perfectly fine.

Post your best times in the comments!!!! :)
